metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000101 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Mingw-w64 version 5.0.3 and earlier, 5.0.4, 6.0.0 and 7.0.0 contains an Improper Null Termination (CWE-170) vulnerability in mingw-w64-crt (libc)->(v)snprintf that can result in The bug may be used to corrupt subsequent string functions. This attack appear to be exploitable via Depending on the usage, worst case: network.

criterions.comment: mingw-w64 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
